price: Das schlechte (Verhalten) in alledem ist bei deinem Herrn verabscheut.
arabic: كُلُّ ذَٰلِكَ كَانَ سَيِّئُهُۥ عِندَ رَبِّكَ مَكۡرُوهٗا

version.title: German Translation - Bubenheim
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into German by Abdullah As-Samit (Frank Bubenheim) and Dr. Nadeem Elyas

meta.transliteration: kullu dhālika kāna sayyi-uhu ʿinda rabbika makrūhan
